tweets.text:
2/5 Our @EnvAgencyMids #enforcement notice requires the #landfill operator to cap parts of #WalleysQuarry by midnight 30/04/21. 

This is an important milestone but there will be more to do limit odour. 

I saw progress today 👇 and discussed next steps with @RedIndustries2 https://t.co/o3V9B20fdG

@SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe From  a post on Facebook. @EnvAgencyMids are worried that red industries will bankrupt if they are too strict in enforcement . @RedIndustries2 have only posted a £1m bond which isn’t nearly enough to cover the costs of restoration of the site . So basically let them be gassed

tweets.text: @SilverdaleNorth @EnvAgencyMids Hi SilverdaleNorth, 2 reasons: i) it's best practice to regularly test the machines so they record to v high accuracy but this means raw data has to be processed & ii) we want you to have health advice alongside the data but to do this health experts need to see it first.

There is 10 times more coral reef on the planet than chalk streams. 

The River Wandle is one of only two urban chalk streams in London.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/TSHThMTasv

4/5 We’ve been speaking regularly but it was good to meet up with @AaronBell4NUL today. 

@EnvAgencyMids primary focus for #WalleysQuarry is @RedIndustries2 reducing odour so I was able to reassure him on behalf of his constituents that’s our priority. https://t.co/1zieoKZPsc

5/5 Lastly: 🙏 to those who kindly came to share experiences of living with this odour.

I’ve read & listened to social media, letters to me / @EnvAgencyMids & news reports so have been struck by the #mentalhealth impacts already but hearing from people f2f is always v powerful.

 @PoliceChiefs @TheNICRP https://t.co/pE0ipsYrdi

tweets.text: https://t.co/Y86foAUCUK

Things I thought I’d never tweet for the @EnvAgencyYNE ….

A friend got this clip of a deer swimming and wondering round the #RiverDon in #KelhamIsland, #Sheffield.

It’s really nice to see nature so close to urban centres….. it’s called @theoutdoorcity for a reason 🙌 https://t.co/caWjbvP2JT

Glad to talk to Stuart George today & be clear on the @EnvAgencyMids ongoing plan beyond the #enforcement notice deadline for capping at #WalleysQuarry. 

This is our next focus & we'll share more next week once we've done the assurance on @RedIndustries2 work so far. https://t.co/eIXsWqD1s0

On 4th March 2020 the First-teir Tribunal overruled a decision by EA & ICO not to provide Robert Latimer with data regarding the Whitburn sewage overflow.

1 year, 1 month & 26 days later he has still not received that information.

Why is that @EnvAgency, @ICOnews? https://t.co/wO5G8OTvfh

Crayfish plague has had a devastating impact on native white clawed crayfish populations across Yorkshire. For more info about threats faced and and what you can do: https://t.co/nPTU3qOJoM @EnvAgencyYNE

tweets.text:
Fishing this bank holiday weekend?

Even though it’s illegal to fish for course fish in rivers until 15th June inclusive, there are still plenty of places you can fish legally.

Don’t forget, you must have a valid fishing rod licence. Buy a licence at: https://t.co/fx56eQ45pG https://t.co/c3FpXEsbQE

tweets.text: So Red Industries have moved Walleys Quarry to its own Ltd company? How can this be allowed?! During all of this scrutiny. How can a new company get a license to operate a landfill like this with no prior experience? This is a disgrace, we all know what comes next…@StinkStopthe
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 they have rolled a sheet out and laid 2 shovels of dirt on top, and that is seen as progress?
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Lack of progress? The deadline is tomorrow #stopthestink

@ClareDinnisEA @maricaoneill @EnvAgencyMids Why is it only now your listening? This has gone on for years for us, for years we have been told it’s nothing that we’re imagining it. I don’t imagine been woke up at 3am choking on the air I have to breathe to stay alive, daily headache sore throat dry itchy eyes
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 That looks like the stuff you buy from the garden centre to make a pond 🤔

1/5 Really pleased to be out in #NewcastleunderLyme today with @EnvAgencyMids for a #CovidSafe visit to:
- see @RedIndustries2 progress at #WalleysQuarry
- hear from residents
- see our #airquality monitoring stations
- meet @AaronBell4NUL for an update

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 She is just doing the biggest most obvious PR stunt going . @ClareDinnisEA you need sacking. What exactly is the point of you? You haven’t actually done anything? We’ve got drone footage that could show us this work? I suppose your trying to save face 🙄 chronically useless
@MattHancock @JamesBevanEA @BorisJohnson @ClareDinnisEA #StopTheStink this is not fair it’s not right it’s mortally wrong https://t.co/dtff2UHj2f

urls.title: Walleys Quarry Landfill Site - Latest Update - Environment Agency - Citizen Space
urls.description: Find and participate in consultations run by the Environment Agency

tweets.text:
3/5 We’ve now got 4 monitoring stations collecting #airquality data around #WalleysQuarry. 

We’ve shared March data with #health partners to ensure the public have expert advice on the impacts. 

Data, our report & a link to the advice are all here: https://t.co/Hz9p8O6J4n https://t.co/KtCvLJ8Nze

Fabulous report on @itvnews about @RedIndustries2 and @WalleysL @EnvAgencyMids is it true you are not able to provide today’s report due to technical difficulties? Forgotten to turn the sensors on AGAIN? @itvnews perhaps you could ask them what tech.diffs mean?

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency @ICOnews It’s endemic in there response to FOI requests & always seem to be covering up for the actions/crimes of the polluters 😏 Manifestly unreasonable 🤫 https://t.co/sVXnb7xpuI

Gassed by @RedIndustries2 
Gaslighted by the @EnvAgency & @PHE_EoEngland 

We will stand as a community and fight you with everything we’ve got. What you find is @RedIndustries2 that when you harm our children we have nothing to lose @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/E34PFX01VG

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids The fumes tonight are off the scale in Westlands, they’re so strong you can smell them through the purifier, this is one of the worst nights we’ve ever had so far. For gods sake woman, do something a LOT more aggressive to STOP this! @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink
Landfill gases filling the house again last night. Everywhere stinks. Hubby woke up feeling dizzy. Usual reporting to Env Agency and Council. @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 We don’t want “improvements” and “progress” we want it closed.
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Please remember to turn these ones on... as the data from the end of February is conveniently missing. #stopthestink @StinkStopthe

👏 👏 @EnvAgency trying to cover their 🍑 & cover themselves in glory for saving us (which so far hasn’t worked anyway!) . We will continue to expose them for what they’ve done @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/xynL7kSiN4
@RedIndustries2 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk #StopTheStink https://t.co/qklfE552iq
How are these situations (found in other cities also) allowed to get to this scale? https://t.co/qWGQbC4ZGx

@ChildrensComm do you think this is fair on our children ? Is there anyway you can help our children enjoy their childhood ? @EnvAgencyMids and @PHE_uk  aren’t doing anything . @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe https://t.co/6kNlAY8ajO

An interesting session today looking at how #PFR has progressed to be a mainstreamed solution to #flooding. Great to learn from others & support delivery across the UK @DefraWater @EnvAgency @ouronehome @ANGETERRY @floodre @CIWEMpolicy @Watertight_Int @MMcIlveenDUP @StratagemNI https://t.co/YAoh8mHHhT

How can we host this meeting with the head of @EnvAgency been allowed to be complicit with criminal activity of water companies. ?
@AlokSharma_RDG wake up with what’s happening! https://t.co/M9Mhp6EotC

All around the world, women are leaders in the fight against climate change.

Read HE Razan Al Mubarak, Managing Director of @EADTweets, on why women have an essential role in biodiversity conservation 👇

#TogetherForOurPlanet 🌏

#COP26 | #RaceToZero

https://t.co/4FBizsgdS7

Public Health England: “Based on the current data up to the end of March we would stress that any risk to long- term physical health is likely to be small, however we cannot completely exclude a risk to health from pollutants in the area.”

North Staffordshire Lives Don’t Matter
